goals.description: Advanced Configuration Validation and Schema Management
goals.success_criteria: Implement comprehensive configuration validation with JSON Schema support, custom validators, and real-time validation feedback

goals.description: Intelligent Configuration Migration and Version Management
goals.success_criteria: Build automated configuration migration system with version tracking, backward compatibility, and intelligent upgrade paths

goals.description: Advanced Logging and Debugging Framework with Structured Output
goals.success_criteria: Create sophisticated logging system with structured output, log levels, filtering, and debugging capabilities
